name: fugu-one-ui-effects
description: UI effects library (gold stroke, borders, glow)

scripts.build:gold-stroke: terser src/gold-stroke.js -c -m -o dist/gold-stroke.min.js && javascript-obfuscator dist/gold-stroke.min.js --output dist/gold-stroke.obf.js --rename-globals false
scripts.build:goldfx: terser src/goldfx.js -c -m -o dist/goldfx.min.js && javascript-obfuscator dist/goldfx.min.js --output dist/goldfx.obf.js --rename-globals false
scripts.build:numberAnim: terser src/numberAnim.js -c -m -o dist/numberAnim.min.js && javascript-obfuscator dist/numberAnim.min.js --output dist/numberAnim.obf.js --rename-globals false
scripts.build:particleAroundFX: terser src/particleAroundFX.js -c -m -o dist/particleAroundFX.min.js && javascript-obfuscator dist/particleAroundFX.min.js --output dist/particleAroundFX.obf.js --rename-globals false
scripts.build:starsBg: terser src/starsBg.js -c -m -o dist/starsBg.min.js && javascript-obfuscator dist/starsBg.min.js --output dist/starsBg.obf.js --rename-globals false
scripts.build: npm run build:gold-stroke && npm run build:goldfx && npm run build:numberAnim && npm run build:particleAroundFX && npm run build:starsBg
